description:
Good news, I cracked the code on creating a custom time selection. I created the perfect time selector that upper management need which just might get me promoted. Don't steal my idea!

On a completly unrelated note, how many days has it been since our last incident? I need to validate something. . .

Answer is in the format of: {ctf_X_days_since_last_incident} where X = number of days.

![](https://media1.tenor.com/m/FkJZe6MJ2u8AAAAd/rafiki-its-time.gif)
